articles.title: Americans are crazy for shrimp. Much of it came from India — until now - NPR
articles.description: India's shrimp exports to the U.S. were once a success story. Now the industry faces ruin amid President Trump's 50% tariff on imports from the country.
articles.content: VISAKHAPATNAM, India America's love affair with shrimp is a cultural touchstone, enough that The Daily Show could air multiple segments out of Red Lobster's $11 million loss after it offered a $20 en… [+7747 chars]
